divs: Sighting DetailsDriving home after a night drive in the hills near where i live and while driving westerly along albany st we noticed an airplane traveling ne to Sw directions .as we went around the curve we then saw a second object as shown in video and picture also traveling NE to SW, then we stopped the car and i recorded the event, which the ufo was tracvling in mutiple directions stopping and moving moving at an angle in various directions back and forth i took pictures and videos for about 60 seconds. at the end of the video, the object flew with grat speed descending toward a directions into East Utica and below tree line
